body:
Samuel Lawson reported on the mailing list:

On first load before downloading images, I couldn't select menu items with mouse when first starting the game right after downloading. I had to hold down a mouse button over "Arena" and then use arrow keys to select an item whilst keeping the mouse button depressed. After the images downloaded, the top menu worked fine.

Ubutntu 12.10, AMD64 

java version "1.7.0_09"
OpenJDK Runtime Environment (IcedTea7 2.3.4) (7u9-2.3.4-0ubuntu1.12.10.1)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 23.2-b09, mixed mode)
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: could not select menu items with mouse before downloading images

comments.body:
The UI has change considerably such that I don't think this is relevant anymore.

**Status:** WontFix
